meanings.sent1: The logo on the flag was symbolised by a star.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact had intricate designs symbolised by various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The costume party had a symbolised theme, with everyone dressed as emojis.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was symbolised by the warm smile she always wore.
meanings.sent5: The secret code was symbolised by a series of colored dots.

meanings.definition: To serve as a symbol of.
meanings.sent1: The dove symbolised peace in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The cat symbolised laziness by sleeping all day.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse symbolised hope for sailors lost at sea.
meanings.sent5: The red rose symbolised love in the bouquet.
